posts.title: Mini Fire Extinguisher Lighter
posts.content: The mini fire extinguisher lighter is a cool twist on the tried and true fire extinguisher. Made from solid metal, the mini fire extinguisher lighter is refillable and has an adjustable flame and makes a great stocking stuffer gift idea for smokers.

posts.title: Levitating Light Bulb
posts.content: Illuminate your room with style using this levitating light bulb. This unique awe-inspiring lamp is wirelessly powered via induction while simultaneously employing magnetic levitation to create the magical effect of floating while turned on.

posts.title: Solar Powered Waving Queen
posts.content: Straight from jolly old England, the solar powered waving Queen is here to say hello and wave at all who enter your home – once the sun activates the solar panel on her purse. Apart from a friendly wave, the Queen doesn’t do much else – just like in real life.

posts.title: Bicycle Seat Lock
posts.content: Travel around the city without having to lug around a cumbersome lock by riding on the bicycle seat lock. The cleverly designed seat can be pulled off the bicycle and extended to form a one meter long chain that you can use to lock your bike.

posts.title: R2-D2 Keyboard Projector
posts.content: Let your favorite droid guide you into the future of typing with the R2-D2 keyboard projector. Once R2 gets into position, he can emit a laser keyboard onto any surface you place him, allowing you to type virtually anywhere and complete your assignments in record time.

posts.title: Cooking Apron Cheat Sheet
posts.content: If you struggle to create magic in the kitchen, the cooking apron cheat sheet is just the thing you need to salvage your laughably poor cooking skills. The apron comes printed with cooking guidelines and helpful tips to make you a better chef.

posts.title: Bullet Shaped Whiskey Stones
posts.content: These bullet shaped whiskey stones are the ultimate way to cool your drink without diluting it like regular ice cubes would. Capable of freezing in just under an hour, these 304 stainless steel stones can chill your drink in just 3 minutes.

posts.title: Car Ignition Button Bling
posts.content: Effortlessly add a touch of opulence to your ride’s interior by installing this ignition button bling. It features an easy to apply adhesive backing and comes encrusted in gorgeous crystals available in either silver, pink, or blue hues.

posts.title: Aquatic Treadmill
posts.content: Receive a grueling full body workout without placing too much stress on your bones and joints with the aquatic treadmill. This compact machine allows you to perform your cardio workout in the middle of your pool so you stay cool and energized while you exercise.

posts.title: Llama Duster
posts.content: Make the mundane task of dusting more fun for yourself with this cute and colorful little llama duster. While regular pets only make things dirty, this adorable little fella will use its slender and furry 14 inch long bendable body to help keep your home dust free.

posts.title: Flashing Happy Birthday Cake Topper
posts.content: Give your buddy’s b-day celebration a little Las Vegas flair with this flashing happy birthday cake topper. This reusable cake topper comes embedded with LEDs that flash in a sequence – at the push of button – to give your already delicious cake some added curbside appeal.

posts.title: Scalp Massager
posts.content: Mellow out by relieving daily stress from the comfort of home using this scalp massager. This inexpensive massager comes packed with twelve thin metallic tines that helps increase blood flow and circulation so that you can feel more relaxed.
